name: FullStory
overview: Send feature flag data from the LaunchDarkly JavaScript SDK to FullStory as page properties.
description:
FullStory combines analytics with high-fidelity session replay and intelligent diagnostics so you can fix issues impacting your customers' experience, even if the issues are not reported by customers.

Send feature flag evaluation data from the LaunchDarkly JavaScript SDK to FullStory as page properties.
author: LaunchDarkly
